data.title: Meme project PAIN: Pre-sale raised 185,976 SOL, 80% of the funds raised will be refunded
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Meme project PAIN officials posted on social media that the project raised 185,976 SOL in 48 hours during the pre-sale, but the launch of the Meme does not require so much money. At the launch, PAIN will return 80% of the funds raised and use the remaining 20% ​​to support the release, provide liquidity, and pay for listing fees (if any). It is reported that funds sent after block 318346069 will also be returned.
Odaily reminds users that the price of Meme coins fluctuates greatly, so investors are advised to participate with caution.

data.title: Ethereum Foundation Transfers Significant Funds To Multisig Contract
data.description:
According to Foresight News, Arkham has detected a transaction from the Ethereum Foundation's Grant Provider address, which transferred approximately 220.452 ETH, valued at around $618,000, to a 4/8 multisignature contract starting with the address 0xeF. This funding is likely intended for donation to BuidlGuidl.

BuidlGuidl is an organization focused on creating products, prototypes, and tutorials for Ethereum developers.

data.title: The Ethereum Foundation transferred about 220 ETH to a multi-signature contract, which may be used to donate to BuidlGuidl
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Arkham monitoring, the Grant Provider address of the Ethereum Foundation transferred about 220.452 ETH (worth about $618,000) to a 4/8 multi-signature contract (address starting with 0xeF) 1 hour ago. This fund may be used to donate to BuidlGuidl. BuidlGuidl is an organization dedicated to creating products, prototypes and tutorials for Ethereum developers.

data.title: The probability of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in March remains unchanged after the ADP release
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to CME's "Fed Watch", the probability of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in March is 83.5% (83.5% before the announcement), and the probability of a 25 basis point rate cut is 16.5%. The probability of maintaining the current interest rate unchanged by May is 60.2%, the probability of a cumulative 25 basis point rate cut is 35.2%, and the probability of a cumulative 50 basis point rate cut is 4.6%. (Jinshi)

data.title: Michael Saylor Hints At Bitcoin Strategy Update
data.description: According to Foresight News, MicroStrategy founder Michael Saylor has tweeted about a "₿ig Strategy Day," which may suggest an update related to the company's Bitcoin strategy.

data.title: Google Alters AI Principles Amid Military Use Concerns
data.description: According to PANews, Google has reportedly joined other leading U.S. artificial intelligence companies like OpenAI and Meta in allowing their AI models to be used for military purposes. Local media discovered on Tuesday that Google has removed a commitment from its AI principles that previously pledged to avoid using AI technology for weapons or other potentially harmful applications. In response, Google's Senior Vice President James Manyika and DeepMind's head Demis Hassabis defended this move in a blog post. They argued that collaboration between companies and governments is necessary to support national security through AI advancements.

data.title: U.S. ADP employment in January was 183,000, expected to be 150,000, and the previous value was 122,000
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: The number of ADP employment in the United States in January was 183,000, the expected number was 150,000, and the previous value was 122,000. (Jinshi)

data.title: The number of "small non-farm payrolls" was slightly higher than expected, and the US dollar index DXY did not fluctuate much in the short term
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: The ADP employment in the United States in January recorded 183,000, the highest since October last year, and the market expected 150,000. At present, the short-term fluctuations of spot gold and the US dollar index DXY are not large. (Jinshi)

data.title: CFTC wants more information on Crypto.com, Kalshi Super Bowl contracts
data.description:
The CFTC is questioning whether Crypto.com and Kalshi meet derivatives regulations In December, Crypto.com’s CEO said its derivatives trading platform was the “first regulated platform in the US” Robinhood launched its Super Bowl event contracts on Monday Crypto.com and prediction marketplace Kalshi have been asked to provide more information to the US Commodity Futures Trading […]

data.title: Michael Saylor tweets 'Grand Strategy Day' with Bitcoin symbol
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: Michael Saylor posted a tweet with the Bitcoin symbol "Grand Strategy Day (₿ig Strategy Day)".
